issue.title: [R] native type checking in where()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17986](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17986). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The  `where()` implementation in ARROW-12105 requires simulating a tibble from an Arrow Schema.  Could we have a version of this where we allow native type checks, such as `is_int32()` or `is_decimal()`?
